sections.heading: boards of health; rules and regulations; violations; penalty

71-1631.01.Local boards of health; rules and regulations; violations; penalty.

Any person violating any rule or regulation, authorized by the provisions of either subdivision (7) or (9) of section 71-1631, shall be guilty of a Class III misdemeanor, and each day's violation shall be considered a separate offense.

SourceLaws 1955, c. 275, ยง 2, p. 872;Laws 1969, c. 151, ยง 7, p. 717;Laws 1977, LB 39, ยง 161.
